cause.description:
The UW-Whitewater Foundation supports key campus initiatives, the Foundation scholarship program, benefiting students from all academic disciplines, producing the Whitewater Magazine, among many other projects that enhance the lives of current students, alumni, faculty/staff, and the campus.
Before giving, please note the Cause Help section. This Facebook Cause was not developed to give your donations via Facebook but to create awareness of the UW-Whitewater Foundation.
To give DIRECTLY to the Foundation, please visit their website at:
http://www.uww.edu/alumni/foundation/ways_to_give.html
There are many options of how you can choose to give to UW-Whitewater.
1. Support student scholarship and academic success
2. Connect Alumni
3. Support University projects and initiatives
cause.mission: acquire, manage and distribute financial resources to support key University initiatives and priorities.
cause.name: University of Wisconsin - Whitewater Foundation
